"The Shared Ship":
"This explains the Shared Ship.

The Shared Ship is a place where you can interact with other players beyond the normal boundaries of your Ship. Within this Ship, you can play Challenge Quests with players from other Ships.

You can access the Shared Ship by selecting \"Move to Shared Ship\" at the Teleporter.

There is a limit on the number of people in the Ship, so if you can't get in, please wait a little bit and try again."
